Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Наконец-то!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Finally!{Line} There you are!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Где тебя черти носили?{Line} Я уже весь сад обыскал.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Where the hell were you?{Line} I was lookin’ all over the place.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Мы же теперь оба сиды! А это значит...{Line} У нас есть собственные комнаты, чувак!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“We’re both now members of SeeD, right?{Line} Well, guess what!?{Line} We got our own rooms, baby!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Твоя находится как раз напротив{Line} старой, прямо по коридору.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Your new room’s right across{Line} the hall from your old one.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Вот что меня попросили тебе передать.{Line} Блин, это заняло целую вечность!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“That’s what I was asked to tell you.{Line} Man, it took me forever!”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“(Shhh, here he comes.)”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“(Shhh, here he comes.)”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“(Ok, he’s all yours.)”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“(Ok, he’s all yours.)”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“You’re not going anywhere.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“You’re not going anywhere.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So what’s up?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So what’s up?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“You look so down?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“You look so down?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Come on, {Char Squall}, how old are you?”{Next}“You’re still a teenager. Why don’t you{Line} act like one for a change?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Come on, {Char Squall}, how old are you?”{Next}“You’re still a teenager. Why don’t you{Line} act like one for a change?”

Monologue.Current: (...Just tired.)
Monologue.Original: (...Just tired.)

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Ok, come on. Let’s go to the concert.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Ok, come on. Let’s go to the concert.”

Monologue.Current: (...What?){Line}(...I’m not in the mood){Line}(...I don’t know)
Monologue.Original: (...What?){Line}(...I’m not in the mood){Line}(...I don’t know)

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sorry. I’m not in the mood.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Sorry. I’m not in the mood.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“How come?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“How come?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I’d rather not talk about it.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I’d rather not talk about it.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“...Quistis was right on...{Line} Oh, you’re so predictable.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“...Quistis was right on...{Line} Oh, you’re so predictable.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“...Ok, I’m sorry. I can understand{Line} why you wouldn’t be in the mood.”{Next}“You’re probably still thinking about what{Line} the headmaster said today. He put a lot on{Line} your shoulders. It all happened so fast.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“...Ok, I’m sorry. I can understand{Line} why you wouldn’t be in the mood.”{Next}“You’re probably still thinking about what{Line} the headmaster said today. He put a lot on{Line} your shoulders. It all happened so fast.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So we thought it’d be good for you to come{Line} and unwind a little. Plus I have something{Line} important that I want to talk to you about.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“So we thought it’d be good for you to come{Line} and unwind a little. Plus I have something{Line} important that I want to talk to you about.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Who’s we?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Who’s we?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Who else? Quistis, Selphie,{Line} Zell, Irvine, and, of course, me.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Who else? Quistis, Selphie,{Line} Zell, Irvine, and, of course, me.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Come on... Please, for me?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Come on... Please, for me?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“There’s no point if you don’t show up.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“There’s no point if you don’t show up.”

Monologue.Current: (I don’t know...){Line}(I guess I’ll go){Line}(I just can’t right now)
Monologue.Original: (I don’t know...){Line}(I guess I’ll go){Line}(I just can’t right now)

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“YES! Okay, let’s go!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“YES! Okay, let’s go!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Sorry. I just don’t feel like it.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Sorry. I just don’t feel like it.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Fine... I guess I’ll have to bug{Line} you for the rest of the night.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Fine... I guess I’ll have to bug{Line} you for the rest of the night.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“And I’m gonna keep chanting ‘concert,{Line} concert, concert’ and drive you nuts.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“And I’m gonna keep chanting ‘concert,{Line} concert, concert’ and drive you nuts.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}, you don’t worry{Line} about anything.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}, you don’t worry{Line} about anything.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Is that what you want?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Is that what you want?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Oh man...”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Oh man...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“I’m getting to you already, huh?{Line} Looks like you have no choice!”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“I’m getting to you already, huh?{Line} Looks like you have no choice!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Why not?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Why not?”
